subject: Re: [junit] SimpleTestCollector.isTestClass
msgSnippet: ... Well, yes, it should.  I m pretty sure I have at least one of those in a project I m working on.  I ll look further into it. David Saff
messageBody:
J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
> David Saff wrote:
>
>> Dirk,
>>
>> I'm sorry not to have responded sooner. Are you sure this is a bug?
>> The method is taking in the filename of a class, not a method.
>>
>
> It might be a bug: what if the test class filename starts with "Test"?
> Should that be a test class or not?

Well, yes, it should. I'm pretty sure I have at least one of those in a
project I'm working on. I'll look further into it.

David Saff
